title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2496 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 23, 2015

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2496




On Friday, May 22, 2015, the President signed into law:
H.R. 2496, the “Construction Authorization and Choice Improvements Act,” which extends authorization of a Department of Veterans Affairs medical facility project in Denver, Colorado, and makes certain changes to the Veterans Choice Act.
